short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Delete annoying elements from the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly remove a distracting animation, unnecessary navigation bar or any other element from a web page.

1. Click the extension button,
2. Click an element that you want to remove,
3. Click an element you want to keep.

The subtree of the DOM containing the first element but not the second element will be removed from the page. When you reload the page, everything is back to normal.
